message.content:
cs.DC, cs.SE, cs.PL, cs.DS, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses middleware technologies and their limitations in distributed applications, which falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). The paper also proposes a solution for separating application logic from distribution policy, which is related to Software Engineering (cs.SE) and Programming Languages (cs.PL). The paper mentions the flexibility of transmission policy, which is related to Data Structures (cs.DS) and Systems and Control (cs.SY).
